content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1) and a furnace at position(y2)

### Iron plate factory at position(z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position y2 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough required items in your inventory before attempting to craft. For example, crafting Iron Gear Wheel requires 2 iron plates, which were not available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
